item.title: Re: need Ash Covered Tile
item.content:encoded: QDarthGE i try to get more food pills to you to so if you will w8 to tomorrow you will get all my food (with out the 27) i wish it will be 30 or more

item.title: Re: need Ash Covered Tile
item.content:encoded: I will give you 50 ash covered tiles for as many food pills as you have (27 wil be acceptable).

item.title: Re: need Ash Covered Tile
item.content:encoded: Sounds nice, Ill open up the bucket tomorrow (thursday).

item.title: Re: need Ash Covered Tile
item.content:encoded: i will give you the 27 food pills for the 28 i dont know how to send messege in the game

item.content:encoded:

item.title: Re: need Ash Covered Tile
item.content:encoded: I'll give you 10 tiles for 27 food pills and a puppet.
